title: Package arrived but was still tracking.
text: Usually items are tracked and arrived within the proper timeframe but this item arrived at my location but the tracking still showed it had not been delivered. I had to use the tracking number on the usps website to confirm delivery since I was out of town so that someone could pick this item up for me.

title: SCAM APP
text: This whole app is a scam. Can never get in contact with anyone. To have a better ‚Äòcustomer experience‚Äô its not my job to go searching online and through multiple places to get the correct contact information. That is your guys jobs when creating this app and verifying correctly the shops that you allow to sell items from. That is the best customer experience making your customers shopping experience and receiving the things the order timely and with a reliable customer support! I got scammed out of $160 and I tried to contact the shop and customer support MULTIPLE TIMES. I never received my item nor have I received an email back. Never shop from this app.

title: A lot of email traffic
text:
The app was not user friendly. It sells/shares personal data significantly increasing spam emails. And does not provide tracking. I have discussed with my current vendors these issues and have cancelled contracts and orders until they stop using the ‚ÄúShop‚Äù app and services. 
Selling personal info in my mind leads to more and more identity theft and invasion of privacy. 
My business does just fine without this kind of service. 
Kind of reminds me of that SLC Utah lady who is in prison.

title: Would normally give 5 stars but‚Ä¶
text: I don‚Äôt know if this is new with a recent update but I used to be able to easily find my open installment payments listed on the app so it was easy to see which ones aren‚Äôt paid off yet and when the next payment is due. Now I can‚Äôt find them in a neat list anymore but have to search through all my past orders and open the order to figure out if it still has open payments. This app is super easy to use and in the past I would have given it 5 stars but this recent update and not being able to neatly see all my not yet paid off installments is super inconvenient and frustrating so for now I‚Äôll have to give 3 stars
